page.title: 15Attitudes
page.content: There are a lot of mixed attitudes in the area :most of them are to do with the new council estate.Those who live in the new houses like the area vrey much but the others think there have been too many changes.Some people are disgusted with the amount of traffic they receive through their village and the amount of pollution it causes.They say that a lot more suitable route should be made to and from the ringroad. The local residents believe that if houses can be built,continuosly expanding the city then some playing fields could be made for local schools.Others argue that if these people want to stop city expansion,then they should set a better example. .
